detaileddescription.para: Map GUI option ID to node setting name.

memberdef.argsstring: (interfaces::Node &node, OptionsModel::OptionID option, const std::string &suffix, const common::SettingsValue &value)
memberdef.name: UpdateRwSetting

briefdescription.para: Convert enabled/size values to bitcoin -prune setting.
Get pruning enabled value to show in GUI from bitcoin -prune setting.

detaileddescription.para: Get pruning size value to show in GUI from bitcoin -prune setting. If pruning is not enabled, just show default recommended pruning size (2GB).

Parse pruning size value provided by user in GUI or loaded from QSettings (windows registry key or qt .conf file). Smallest value that the GUI can display is 1 GB, so round up if anything less is parsed.
Helper function to copy contents from one QSettings to another. By using allKeys this also covers nested settings in a hierarchy.
Back up a QSettings to an ini-formatted file.
